name: n8n-nodes-base.readPDF
semantic_context: Reads a PDF and extracts its content

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property from which to read the PDF file
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary property from which to read the PDF file

password.name: password
password.description: Password to decrypt the PDF file with
password.ai_hint: Password to decrypt the PDF file with

conditional_rules: IF encrypted == True THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
